author: Jamie Spruce
comment: Ambient mode should be a dimmer version of normal. Unfortunately it's a mono-colour version. Also as many others have said to no avail - the battery level needs to fit in the circle. Come on devs - get your act together!!
title: Devs - Get your act together!

author: Michael W
comment: The pics are misleading. It shows the %fitting in the circle. (Screen shot it for your records) ESPECIALLY the 3rd pic. It should all be reduced to fit inside the circle. But now that I look at the reviews and some of the dates to this very complaint in 2014, obviously these request for corrections will go ignored. They need to refund if they have no plans to fix it. Guess I won't be buying anymore unfortunately :-/
title: Nice but I'm thinking this Dev is not open to suggestions. Plus misleading pictures.

author: Stu Robinson
comment: Battery percentage needs reducing in size as it goes over the circle frame on G Watch R.
title: Needs tweaking.

author: Frankie M
comment: Thank you best watches for lg g watch r

author: Ian Parrott
comment: Nice face. Please add 24 hr time.
